    • saveDecision

      public void saveDecision(DecisionNotification decisionNotification)
      Persists a decision notification to the database.

      This method attempts to retrieve an existing AccountDecisionEntity by the service reference ID from the repository. If no existing entity is found, a new one is created and stored. In all cases, an AccountDecisionEvent is saved to record the decision.

      Any repository exceptions encountered during this process are logged as errors, but not rethrown.

      Parameters:
      decisionNotification - the DecisionNotification containing decision details, including service reference ID, service specification ID, and decision type

    • computeDecision
